This luxurious feeling, Moisturizing Hand Sanitizer kills 99.99% of disease-causing germs and reduces the risk of infection from the spread of germs. Within just 10 seconds of application, hands are clean, fresh and germ free - no soap, water or towels required. This unique formulation will not dry out the skin and actually leaves hands feeling softer.
This product is sustainable with an optional 99 to 100% Biodegradable formulation.
Good for you and the environment.

Use one to two pumps several times a day as needed to prevent the spread of germs and bacteria.

organic-beeswax-food-wraps,Organic Beeswax Food Wraps,"

Looking for a way to replace plastic in the kitchen? These reusable Food Wraps can be used over and over again, made from responsibly sourced organic Beeswax. Washable, plastic free wraps are a great alternative to your typical food storage methods. This is a compostable item.
Each 3 piece set comes with a small (7.87 x 7.87 in), medium (9.84 x 9.84 in), and large (11.8 x 11.8 in) size. These packs will contain a random mixture of beautiful colors.
Use the warmth of your hands to mold the food wrap around your food or food saving dishes.
Hand wash in cool water and lay flat to dry. Then - store in a cool, dry location.

column3: >Prepare for smooth, hydrated lips all day long. Our lip butter has all natural ingredients, so you can rest assured about any of the ingredients you may ingest - and they taste amazing!

column1: Coconut Oil can help replenish lost moisture from your lips for a long lasting hydration. Mango Butter is naturally moisturizing and full of essential fatty acids, and helps treat dry skin. Vitamin E is also recommended for extremely chapped or cracked lips. We love the buttery smoothness of this lip butter!

While this product does not have an added SPF to the product, Coconut Oil also has a natural SPF rating of 4-6, which can block 75% of UV rays. 75% protection would be good for 45 minutes of sun exposure.

pumpkin-spice-body-scrub,Pumpkin Spice Sugar Scrub,"

It's back! A favorite from 2018, we are excited to have this scrub back in the line up. This incredible smelling sugar scrub is going to be your new best friend. We can't help it when you fall in love!

Packed with a nourishing blend of oils, your skin will be left feeling velvety smooth. This product has a light Pumpkin Pie aroma - and it is completely natural.  
This product is free of synthetic thickening or gelling agents. Separation of oils and sugars are completely normal. Just mix, dispense and fall in love
Pair this luxurious Body Scrub with our Pumpkin Enzyme Face Mask for head to toe exfoliation and softness.

Organic, Fair Trade Sugars: Gentle and exfoliating, sugars are natural humectants which will help seal moisture into your skin from the environment.
Sweet Almond Oil: High in Vitamin E and antioxidants, this oil can help protect your skin from UV rays and the environment. Fatty acids in the oil can heal any overly dry or chapped skin.
Avocado Oil: Also high in vitamins and fatty acids, this amazing oil protects from the environment and has been shown to increase collagen production.
Pumpkin: Loaded with alpha hydroxy acids and fruit enzymes, this key ingredient is known to increase cell turnover and overall will brighten and smooth the skin. Containing Vitamins A and C, it will provide an overall boost and help prevent signs of aging.


These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent disease.

*Cane Sugar (certified fair trade), *Brown Sugar (certified fair trade), Fractionated Coconut Oil, *Vanilla Bean Sugar (*Raw sugar infused with Vanilla extract and Vanilla Bean Powder), Sweet Almond Oil, Avocado Oil, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Powder, Sambucus Nigra (Black Elderberry) Fruit Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Fruit Extract, *Cinnamon, *Nutmeg, *Ginger, *Cloves


* Denotes Certified Organic
Vegan Product
Cruelty Free

Transfer desired amount of scrub into a separate contanier. Gently scrub body in circular motions. Remove with warm water. Fall in love with your skin.


*DO NOT GET MOISTURE IN PRODUCT JAR

column1: Organic Coconut Oil makes this soap really bubbly, and deeply moisturizes your skin while cleansing. It is known to help relieve dry, itchy skin and provide lasting moisture. Antioxidants in Olive Oil are known to help with premature aging and provide those essential fatty acids that your skin craves. Sunflower Oil is an amazing emollient full of Vitamin E as well. Lemon Essential Oil is known for its astringent properties, as well as detoxing the skin and giving an overall glow. The smell alone is an amazing mood boost.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent disease.
Vegetable Shortening, Water, *Virgin Coconut Oil, +Sodium Hydroxide, *Olive Oil, Sunflower Oil, Lemon Essential Oil, Lemongrass Essential Oil, Turmeric

* Denotes Certified Organic
+None remains after saponification process

Cruelty Free
This incredible soap can be used as a hand soap or a full body soap!
If using on the face, test a small area first to check any sensitivities to the essential oils.

mini-travel-bag,Mini Travel Bag,"

Adorable cosmetic bags, ready to stash away our Minis, or store any other goodies you wish.

Our cosmetic bags are made of a cotton canvas material. These bags are printed with eco friendly water based ink using direct to garment technology. Spot cleaning is recommended, however if you must wash, please do so inside out, with cool water on a delicate cycle. Hang dry.

bamboo-wash-cloths,Organic Bamboo Cotton Cleansing Cloths,"

Our ultra soft wash cloths are hand sewn with love - perfect for using during your facial cleansing and even soft enough for babies.

This material is super soft and absorbent fleece. We use fabric that is eco-friendly and made in the USA. We care about what you put on your face and babies delicate skin. This material is CPSIA compliant, meeting strict standards free of lead and phthalates. Made from yarns that are GOTS certified organic and made in the USA.
Cute serged edges for durability in natural white or baby pink thread.
Use to massage your Cleansers away from your face gently, or use to cleanse your body.

Wash in a mild fragrance-free detergent. It is recommended to wash on a delicate cycle, placing them in a mesh garment bag and drying on low and removing promptly. 

",Lila Naturals,Accessories,"babies,cleanser,combination skin,cotton,gift set,makeup remover,sensitive skin",2019-02-08T06:31:00-05:00,Color,Natural White,,,,,14,,,1,deny,manual,22,,,,,https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0020/6585/8624/products/organic-bamboo-cotton-cleansing-cloths-648525.jpg?v=1588773417,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

column3: >Our Botanical Cleansing Oil is a dreamy consistency, ready to melt away any makeup from the day and cleanse your skin of impurities deep below the surface. Free of any suds, this cleanser is gentle for any skin type. Packed with botanical extracts, this formula is a hydrating, nutritious treat for your skin. Massage this velvety cleanser on your skin and erase your makeup and daily build up. When used properly, this will not leave your skin oily at all.
>8oz and 2 oz. Packaged in glass. Please recycle.
>None of these statements have been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent disease.

Tea Tree Essential Oil is a natural antiseptic and can help fend off acne causing bacteria. Loved for helping with dryness, pimples, and skin irritations - pairing this with detoxing charcoal is a winning combination.

soap-deck,Soap Deck,"
A hand crafted soap deck to help our natural cleansing bars drain and dry properly in between uses.. These are made of gorgeous Pine, sealed in food grade mineral oil and tested by soaking them in water for 24 hours to ensure the wood does not swell upon daily use. Our hand crafted soaps do not contain hardeners or preservatives, so proper drainage is essential for product longevity

After using our Cleansing bars, place your bar on your soap deck to allow for proper drainage which will allow your soap to last longer.

column1: Goat's Milk contains Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs) which naturally exfoliates away dead skin cells and helps increase healthy cell turnover. By removing build up, it can help improve many skin conditions. High in Vitamin A, this helps with skin repair and is known to help with Psoriasis. Naturally emolient, it will help moisturize your skin and not strip away your own oils - which you know we are huge fans of! Of course, we also love it for its ability to fend off bacteria and keep acne at bay.
We also love Organic Honey for its ability to keep acne away, eliminate bacteria and hydrate your skin.

peppermint-lip-oopsies,Lip Butter Oopsies!,"

What are these ""oopsies"" you ask? They are the same incredible product as our normal Lip Butters, only these might have gotten a little messy in the pouring process. This tube might have some wax down the side under the label, but your product is absolutely fine!

Coconut Oil can help replenish lost moisture from your lips for a long lasting hydration. Mango Butter is naturally moisturizing and full of essential fatty acids, and helps treat dry skin. Vitamin E is also recommended for extremely chapped or cracked lips. We love the buttery smoothness of this lip butter!

While this product does not have an added SPF to the product, Coconut Oil also has a natural SPF rating of 4-6, which can block 75% of UV rays. 75% protection would be good for 45 minutes of sun exposure.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent disease.

Vegan Product
Cruelty Free

banana-smoothie-face-mask,Banana Smoothie Face Mask,"

Hydrate and Brighten

This absolutely fantastic smelling mask is perfect for all skin types. You will notice visibly brighter skin thanks to our organic banana, and instant hydration and softer skin. Organic Oats will soothe the skin and help any irritation your skin may be suffering from. Coconut Milk will help aid in extra hydration along side the Banana. Red Algae is used for thickening, hydration and cell turnover for collagen production.

This mask will be in a powdered form that you will mix yourself. This will give you the longest shelf life and the freshest mask. Our 2 ounce jar will give you 10-13 uses.
*In testing, women noticed visibly more glowing and softer skin in just one use.
Pair your Face Mask kit with our wooden spoon!

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent disease.

pumpkin-enzyme-face-mask,Pumpkin Enzyme Face Mask,"

Detox, Exfoliate, Brighten
Your new friend for bright, clear skin.
This detoxing enzyme mask is excellent for exfoliation, acne and dull skin.
Please test a small area of skin to ensure no irritation occurs.
This mask may cause temporary pinkness in the skin. This is due to increased blood flow at the surface. This is temporary. If you experience any skin sensitivies, discontinue use.

Oats: Soothe, soften and cleanse the skin with natural saponins
Cacao: Raw Cacao has 40 times the antioxidant contents of blueberries. Overall, it is shown to improve the skin health, increase blood flow and help with skin hydration.
Bromelain: Derived naturally from Pineapple, Bromelain was first shown to increase wound healing and help with burn treatments. Working as a powerful exfoliant and loaded with Vitamin C, Bromelain will help soften the skin, slough off dead skin cells and increase the cell turnover process.
Pumpkin: Loaded with alpha hydroxy acids and fruit enzymes, this key ingredient is known to increase cell turnover and overall will brighten and smooth the skin. Containing Vitamins A and C, it will provide an overall boost and help prevent signs of aging.
Cinnamon: A powerful antibacterial agent, useful in treating acne in the skin
This mask will be in a powdered form that you will mix yourself. This will give you the longest shelf life and the freshest mask. Our 2.5 ounce jar will give you 12-15 uses.
Create a kit! Add a Mixing Bowl, Brush and Spoon!

This mask may cause temporary pinkness in the skin. This is due to increased blood flow at the surface. This is temporary. If you experience any skin sensitivities, discontinue use.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent disease.

*Oats, *Cacao Powder (certified fair trade), Bromelain Powder, *Cinnamon, (Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Fruit Powder

* Denotes Certified Organic
Vegan Product
Cruelty Free

After cleansing, mix approximately 1 teaspoon of Mask Powder with 1/2 teaspoon liquid of choice (water, milk, yogurt). Mix together to create a paste like consistency. Apply onto dry face and neck using our face mask brush, avoiding eye area. Allow to sit for 1-10 minutes. Remove gently with a warm damp cloth. Pat dry.
This is a strong enzyme mask. Start by leaving on only for one minute and work upwards to allow your skin to adjust.

*DO NOT GET MOISTURE IN PRODUCT JAR

column2: >Apply all over face and allow it to absorb. Add more as needed.

>This is a very rich cream, and we have no other fillers or additives in our products. Because of this, a little bit goes a long way. It is recommended to start with a tiny bit and dab onto sections of your face and then rub in. Wait a minute or so to allow these natural oils to absorb and adjust to your skin and then add more if needed.

>Many of our customers love using this product as a night cream, or a heavy duty, multi tasking mask. To use as a mask, apply a very thin layer to freshly cleansed skin. Let this sit for about 10-15 minutes and then absorb and wipe away with a warm washcloth. You will be left with incredibly soft and smooth skin.

column2: >Organic oats and chamomile soothe the skin, while coconut milk hydrates and helps seal in moisture. Our clays help to remove dirt and impurities from your pores gently and will not strip your skin of its natural oils. Oats also contain saponins which are natural cleansers. When you are not adding water to the bottle, you are lessening the chance of any bacteria, the shelf life is greatly extended, and you are getting more product. You can choose the liquid you mix with, such as water, oil, milk or even yogurt depending on what you like for your skin!

column1:
*Oats, Kaolin Clay, Dry Milk Powder (coconut), *Chamomile Flower 
* Denotes Certified Organic

column2: >Mix approximately 1 teaspoon of Grains with 1/2 teaspoon liquid of choice (water or cleansing oil). Blend together to create a paste like consistency. Massage onto wet face, avoiding the eye area. Remove gently with a warm damp cloth. Pat dry.

>Our cleansing grains can also be used as a light duty facial mask. Once you follow the instructions above, just allow the product to sit on your face, as it will dry and harden a bit. Leave on for a few minutes before removing gently with a warm, damp cloth.
>*DO NOT GET MOISTURE IN PRODUCT BOTTLE
>Store in a cool, dry location for maximum shelf life.
